title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1925.3 - Criminal history criteria
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 1925.3 - Criminal history criteria

State Regulations

No inmate shall be permitted to participate in a day
reporting program if his underlying criminal conviction was for an A-1 felony
offense, or an offense defined in article 130 of the Penal

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
1925.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
